attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to: 'Support and lead a public and governmental debate on the benefits or otherwise of supporting the establishment and growth of Islam in Britain. This should refer to the original and core values and direction promoted by the Qu’ran itself and it’s originator Mohammed. The debates should be free to make frank assessments that seek to preserve western values relating to democracy, personal freedoms and should make judgments and lead to recommendations and if necessary laws which are in the interest of the British people; in particular the indigenous population.'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent events that is some medical staff from Islamic countries working for the NHS are closet bombers and the world-wide recognition that mosques may be proactively supportive of islamic radicals to the extent they may be used as safe houses and terrorist bases….should sound alarm bells  and be factors for the launch of a national debate that assesses the real basis of Islam, it’s intent for non-believers and the mechanisms by which it's political ambitions may be curbed.
